string.text: {=5m9ld6a6}One of {SETTLEMENT}'s patrol parties was destroyed by {DESTROYER}.

{=ppfUuxwa}We have encountered some {BANDIT_NAME} {?IS_TODAY}today.{?}{DAYS_AGO} days ago.{\?}{?IS_AROUND_SETTLEMENT} They were roaming around {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{?}{\?} We {?DEAD_COUNT}lost {DEAD_COUNT} of our men to those damned arseholes{?}didn't lose any men{\?} in that battle.{?WOUNDED_COUNT} Damned {BANDIT_NAME} also wounded {WOUNDED_COUNT} of my guys.{?}{\?}
{=mflOH8vp}We have caught{?COUNT} bandit scums{?} one bandit scum{\?} so far. We will ransom them at {SETTLEMENT}.
{=qJtokSKh}We haven't captured any bandits so far. We are still searching for them.
{=VAMWmVNe}We don't even have a day worth of food. We are heading back to {SETTLEMENT}.
{=NYW0FWfC}We have food enough for {DAYS} {?DAYS}days{?}day{\?} worth of food. We will head back to {SETTLEMENT} soon to restock.
{=OpurAr8K}We have food enough for {DAYS} {?DAYS}days{?}day{\?} worth of food. We won't be heading back town anytime soon.
{=SoEDbUfq}No, we don't have enough food. Do you want us to starve to death?
{=HjqLF66G}No, we need to muster more men. We will head back to town.
{=Qnx2muXY}{SETTLEMENT} Garrison is not suitable to muster a patrol party.
{=SkMYVtbs}Settlement has already maximum amounts of patrol parties.
{=GasbXRgy}Your clan needs more recognition before recruiting patrol parties.
{=c7R1mItz}There is already one party getting ready at this time.
{=T4I8F9nt}A new patrol party will be ready for duty after a day.
{=JOe6kMhR}You wanted to hire some extra protection for {SETTLEMENT}. But it'll cost you.{NEWLINE}{CURRENT_PATROL_STATUS}

{=Zo2fIQFk}({SETTLEMENT} has {?CURRENT_ACTIVE_COUNT}{CURRENT_ACTIVE_COUNT}{?}no{\?} active patrol parties.){NEWLINE}{?CURRENT_QUEUE_COUNT}(There is one party getting ready.{?}(There are no parties on the queue.{\?})
{=VKbgHi27}{?PLAYER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {PLAYER.LINK}...We'll be on our way if you don't have anything important to say.
{=ZjjfiS3t}We don't take place in wars, scum.
{=c9hNQjNT}You paid {GOLD} {GOLD_ICON} for town patrol units' expense.
{=ppCstYP0}You can now hire extra protection for your settlements.
{=MQoMQQxF}Auto-recruitment won't work when the town is under siege.
{=Ub4IcWAe}A new patrol party was added to spawn queue of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} through auto-recruitment.
{=7zQiK6wr}This option disbands all patrolling units and turns of the auto-recruitment.
{=WaYABMl1}You can't disband your units while there is a party on the spawn queue.
{=EgxF1C91}Party name needs to be between 5 - 50 characters.
{=aX3pOl11}Party name can't start or end with space.
{=rxXgzQWl}Party name cannot contain consecutive white spaces.
{=yutfa56R}Town Patrol party must have at most {MAX_PARTY_SIZE} troops.
{=8Ulkaa0Z}Town Patrol party must have at least {MIN_PARTY_SIZE} troops.
{=zM6zger7}Waiting for town patrol units to become ready.
{=VrnlUvV8}I'm here to deliver you my demands!
{=6Fja0XWl}Eh!? What do you mean by that?
{=jKFG35ba}You dare challenge us?! We will drink from your skull!
{=qftE5ZmO}Let's have a look at your name...
